notes: Abyssador is the hardest of the [[Warzone]] bosses.
name: Abyssador
behaviour: Has a very erratic retargeting behavior. Goes invisible often.
strategy:
Trap it in the western part of his dungeon.
'''[[Mage]]s''' should use [[Sudden Death Rune]]s and summon [[Fire Elemental]]s or [[Fire Devil]]s to deal more damage.
'''[[Paladin]]s''' should use [[Infernal Bolt]]s and [[Sharpshooter]] but have to be wary of the distance attacks.
